hero.title: Your partner for a new beginning
hero.subtitle: We support you in all your immigration, training and professional integration procedures.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover our complete range of services designed to support you in your immigration and professional development project.

immigration.title: Simplified immigration
immigration.subtitle: Our team of experts guides you through the complex immigration process, offering you tailored support to make your life project abroad a reality.

stats.title: Our impact in numbers
stats.description: Results that speak for themselves. Discover how we've helped thousands of people achieve their immigration and career development goals.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from people who have trusted our services and succeeded in their project.

career.title: Develop your career
career.subtitle: Our coaching services help you reveal your professional potential and stand out in the competitive job market.
career.interviewsDesc: Personalized interview simulation sessions to help you gain confidence and master your speech.
career.cvDesc: Creation of professional documents that highlight your skills and attract the attention of recruiters.
career.skillsDesc: In-depth assessment of your skills and identification of career opportunities suited to your profile.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Take the first step towards your new life. Test your eligibility or contact us for personalized support.

footer.companyDesc: Professional solutions for immigration, training and recruitment.

about.title: About MigraPro
about.description: MigraPro has been supporting individuals and professionals in their immigration, training, and career development projects for over 10 years.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Facilitate access to new professional and personal opportunities for our clients by providing them with personalized support and tools tailored to their specific needs.
mission.paragraph2: We are committed to simplifying complex immigration and professional development processes by offering a human, efficient, and quality service.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: To be recognized as a trusted partner for all those who wish to realize their immigration and professional development projects, in France and internationally.
vision.paragraph2: We aspire to create a world where borders are no longer obstacles to professional ambitions and where everyone can fully develop their potential.

stats.title: MigraPro in Numbers
stats.description: Concrete results that testify to our expertise and commitment to our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These values guide each of our actions and are an integral part of our corporate culture.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: A team of qualified professionals in their respective fields, offering advice based on solid experience and in-depth knowledge.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: A constant commitment to quality and excellence in all our services, with attention to detail and a focus on the needs of each client.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: An inclusive approach that respects cultural diversity and adapts to the specific needs of each person, regardless of their origin.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Optimized processes and clear communication to save you time and facilitate your procedures at every step.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate and experienced professionals dedicated to the success of your projects.

member1.bio: Immigration specialist with over 15 years of experience in supporting immigration candidates.

member2.bio: Expert in professional development and creation of personalized training paths.

member3.bio: Certified coach specializing in supporting professional transitions and personal development.

member4.bio: International recruitment specialist with particular expertise in the technology and health sectors.

cta.title: Ready to start your project with us?
cta.description: Contact our team today to discuss your needs and find out how we can help you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Welcome to MigraPro's Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you provide to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose and protect your information when you use our services.
privacy.infoCollectedText: We may collect the following types of information:
infoCollectedItems: Personal information: name, address, email, phone number
Identification information: copies of passport, visa, work permit
Professional information: CV, employment history, qualifications
Financial information: bank statements, proof of funds
Navigation data: IP address, browser type, pages visited
privacy.infoUseText: We use your personal information to:
infoUseItems: Provide our immigration consulting, training and recruitment services
Prepare and submit immigration applications on your behalf
Contact you regarding your case or our services
Improve our services and your user experience
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacy.infoSharingText: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
infoSharingItems: Immigration and government authorities as part of your application
Our service partners who help us provide our services
Legal experts or consultants involved in your case
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, including to satisfy any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
privacy.yourRightsText: Depending on your place of residence, you may have the right to:
yourRightsItems: Access the personal information we hold about you
Restrict or object to the processing of your information
Request the portability of your data
privacy.policyChangesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The most recent version will always be available on our website with the effective date.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or our data processing practices, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing or using MigraPro's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.servicesText: MigraPro offers immigration consulting, professional training, coaching, career guidance and recruitment services. Our services include, but are not limited to:
servicesItems: Preparation and submission of immigration applications
terms.feesText: Fees for our services are communicated before any service begins. Payment must be made according to the agreed terms. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise specified in a specific written agreement.
terms.clientObligationsText: By using our services, you agree to:
clientObligationsItems: Provide truthful, accurate and complete information
Promptly update your information if changes occur
Respect agreed deadlines for providing documents
Comply with applicable laws and regulations
terms.liabilityText: MigraPro strives to provide quality services, but cannot guarantee the favorable outcome of any immigration application or administrative procedure. We are not responsible for decisions made by governmental or immigration authorities.
terms.liabilityText2: Our liability is limited to providing the services agreed upon in our contract. In no case shall our liability exceed the amount paid for our services.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on our website and our documents are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify or create derivative works without our prior written permission.
terms.confidentialityText: We are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this policy.
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate our services at any time, for any reason. You may also terminate your engagement with us, subject to the specific conditions of your contract.
terms.modificationsText: We may modify these terms of use at any time. Modifications will take effect upon their publication on our website. It is your responsibility to regularly review these terms.
terms.lawText: These terms of use are governed by the laws of Madagascar. Any dispute arising from or related to these terms will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Madagascar.
terms.contactUsText: If you have any questions regarding these terms of use, please contact us at:
